thread.title: MCS Live Faceoff: UMass Lowell vs. Colorado College
thread.title_full: MCS Live Faceoff: UMass Lowell vs. Colorado College

author: Justin Soderberg
title: MCS Live Faceoff: UMass Lowell vs. Colorado College
text:
Tweet on Twitter 
Mill City Sports returns for another special of MCS Live with host Justin Soderberg , brought to you by Beast from the Northeast , on Saturday, October 17th from 1:00-2:30 p.m. eastern. Only on MillCitySports.com ! 
Episode 14 will feature a preview of the UMass Lowell River Hawks taking on the Colorado College Tigers in the second game of a two-game series at the Tsongas Center in Lowell, Massachusetts. 
MCS Live will recap last weekend’s season opening win over R.P.I. and Friday night’s contest against Colorado College. Plus, preview Saturday’s game against the Tigers, talk UMass Lowell hockey and more. 
The second episode of the 2015-16 hockey season will feature interviews with special Greg Celona of Mill City Sports , Kevin Zwirble of Beast from the Northeast and UMass Lowell head coach Norm Bazin . 
Justin will answer Twitter and Facebook questions and possibly phone calls if time allows. 
Tune in on Saturday, October 17th at 1:00 p.m. eastern to listen to MCS Live! If you can’t listen live, you can always stream the audio archive starting only minutes after the live broadcast. Listen on your mobile device on the way to the Tsongas Center!
